name: Linkle
descricao: Linkle is a playable Warrior in Hyrule Warriors Legends. She can be transferred over to Hyrule Warriors as well. She wields dual Crossbows as her weapon and uses them alongside quick kicks to attack enemies. Her story is described as a side story separate from the rest of the game's plot.

name: Yeto
descricao: Yeto is a character in Twilight Princess.

name: Princess Zelda
descricao: Zelda, traditionally Princess Zelda, is the eponymous character of The Legend of Zelda series. With the exception of Link's Awakening, Majora's Mask, and Tri Force Heroes, an incarnation of Zelda or one of her alter egos has always been one of the central characters in the series.

name: Ganon
descricao: Ganon, also known by his original/human form Ganondorf, is the main antagonist of The Legend of Zelda series. Ganon is a nickname for Ganondorf and the name given to him when he transforms into a boar-like beast. He made his debut appearance in the first game, The Legend of Zelda, and has since been present or referred to in most subsequent iterations.
